TopicTitle: All Buildings Upgraded instantly in career

Articles.Content:
A couple of hours ago I purchased the new (Thank you Squad!) DLC for the game. Removing most of the mods from my install using CKAN, I launched into the game and started a new career save. (1)

However, as soon as I recovered my first flight(2), the game suddenly showed every single building up to its third tier. No buttons worked, I could not enter any building or view anything. Opening the ESC menu, I could do anything as long as it didn't change the main game behind the menu (ie no leaving to the main menu, no jumping to the tracking station, etc)

Does anyone know what is happening, or how I could fix this problem?

 

(1) List of mods now installed:

(2) You know the flight I mean. Objectives to transmit science and launch the first vessel. Quick little SRB jump to 5000m, grab science from the surface then from in flight, land everything with the one wimpy chute.... that one.

Note: I did Have Physics Range Extender installed because I used BahamutoD's armoury. But it isn't installed anymore, just cached in CKAN.

I know PRE causes a lot of glitches so its gone.

Does the issue persists after restarting the game?

I have no explanation for the upgraded buildings so far but the other issue sounds like an input lock. If it happens again, open the debug menu (alt + F12, sometimes ctrl + aft + F12 or press ESC and click on "show version info"). The debug menu contains a tab for input locks and a button to release all active locks. The buildings and the main menu should become available again after releasing the locks.

Well, in my experience, input locks can also cause visual glitches (usually a stuck camera in an odd place at the KSC and/or a black sky if visual mods are installed) like the whole game is kinda stuck in a loading process. Maybe this also happened to your buildings and releasing the input locks may fix it as well

On 5/31/2019 at 4:34 PM, 4x4cheesecake said:

Does the issue persists after restarting the game?

I have no explanation for the upgraded buildings so far but the other issue sounds like an input lock. If it happens again, open the debug menu (alt + F12, sometimes ctrl + aft + F12 or press ESC and click on "show version info"). Well, in my experience, input locks can also cause visual glitches (usually a stuck camera in an odd place at the KSC and/or a black sky if visual mods are installed) like the whole game is kinda stuck in a loading process. Maybe this also happened to your buildings and releasing the input locks may fix it as well

Restarting the game unlocks everything for me until I recover a mission again. 

I just attempted to unlock everything using the input locks button, but it didn't help, I'm still stuck in the tracking centre,

However, after each time I unlock it, almost immediately something labelled "DebugToolbar' activates immediately.

 

I'm just going for a completely fresh install at this point. Although, I am keeping the save file. That might help.

Edited June 3, 2019 by ItBeNiro
